verses.verse: <S%G1161>Moreover,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> I <S%G2309>would<s%> not that you should be <S%G50>ignorant,<s%> how that <S%G3956>all<s%> our <S%G3962>fathers<s%> were <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G3507>cloud,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1330>passed<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G2281>sea;<s%>
And were <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G907>baptized<s%> to <S%G3475>Moses<s%> in the <S%G3507>cloud<s%> and in the <S%G2281>sea;<s%>
And did <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5315>eat<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G1033>meat;<s%>

And did <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4095>drink<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G4188>drink:<s%> for they <S%G4095>drank<s%> of that <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G4073>Rock<s%> that <S%G190>followed<s%> them: and that <S%G4073>Rock<s%> was <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
But with <S%G4119>many<s%> of them <S%G2316>God<s%> was not <S%G2106>well<s%> <S%G2106>pleased:<s%> for they were <S%G2693>overthrown<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things were our <S%G5179>examples,<s%> to the intent we should not <S%G1511>lust<s%> <S%G1938><s%> <S%G1938>after<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> things, as they <S%G2548>also<s%> <S%G1937>lusted.<s%>

<S%G3366>Neither<s%> be you <S%G1496>idolaters,<s%> as were <S%G5100>some<s%> of them; as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> The <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G2523>down<s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%> and <S%G4095>drink,<s%> and <S%G450>rose<s%> up to <S%G3815>play.<s%>

<S%G3366>Neither<s%> let us <S%G4203>commit<s%> <S%G4203>fornication,<s%> as <S%G5100>some<s%> of them <S%G4203>committed,<s%> and <S%G4098>fell<s%> in <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> and <S%G1501>twenty<s%> <S%G5505>thousand.<s%>
<S%G3366>Neither<s%> let us <S%G1598>tempt<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> as <S%G5100>some<s%> of them <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3985>tempted,<s%> and were <S%G622>destroyed<s%> of <S%G3789>serpents.<s%>
<S%G3366>Neither<s%> <S%G1111>murmur<s%> you, as <S%G5100>some<s%> of them <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1111>murmured,<s%> and were <S%G622>destroyed<s%> of the <S%G3644>destroyer.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things <S%G4819>happened<s%> to them for <S%G5179>ensamples:<s%> and they are <S%G1125>written<s%> for our <S%G3559>admonition,<s%> on <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G5056>ends<s%> of the <S%G165>world<s%> are <S%G2658>come.<s%>
<S%G5620>Why<s%> let him that <S%G1380>thinks<s%> he <S%G2476>stands<s%> take <S%G991>heed<s%> <S%G3361>lest<s%> he <S%G4098>fall.<s%>

There has <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3986>temptation<s%> <S%G2983>taken<s%> you but such as is <S%G442>common<s%> to <S%G442>man:<s%> but <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G4103>faithful,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> will not <S%G1439>suffer<s%> you to be <S%G3985>tempted<s%> <S%G5228>above<s%> that you are <S%G1410>able;<s%> but will with the <S%G3986>temptation<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4160>make<s%> a <S%G1545>way<s%> to <S%G1545>escape,<s%> that you may be <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G5297>bear<s%> it.
<S%G1355>Why,<s%> my dearly <S%G27>beloved,<s%> <S%G5343>flee<s%> from <S%G1495>idolatry.<s%>
I <S%G3004>speak<s%> as to <S%G5429>wise<s%> men; <S%G2919>judge<s%> you <S%G3739>what<s%> I <S%G5346>say.<s%>

The <S%G4221>cup<s%> of <S%G2129>blessing<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we <S%G2127>bless,<s%> is it not the <S%G2842>communion<s%> of the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ?<s%> The <S%G740>bread<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we <S%G2806>break,<s%> is it not the <S%G2842>communion<s%> of the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ?<s%>

For we being <S%G4183>many<s%> are <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> and <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4983>body:<s%> for we are <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3348>partakers<s%> of that <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G740>bread.<s%>
<S%G991>Behold<s%> <S%G2474>Israel<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh:<s%> are not they which <S%G2068>eat<s%> of the <S%G2378>sacrifices<s%> <S%G2844>partakers<s%> of the <S%G2379>altar?<s%>

<S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G5346>say<s%> I <S%G3767>then?<s%> that the <S%G1497>idol<s%> is <S%G5100>any<s%> thing, <S%G2228>or<s%> that which is <S%G1494>offered<s%> in <S%G1494>sacrifice<s%> to <S%G1494>idols<s%> is <S%G5100>any<s%> thing?

But I say, that the things <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G2380>sacrifice,<s%> they <S%G2380>sacrifice<s%> to <S%G1140>devils,<s%> and not to <S%G2316>God:<s%> and I <S%G2309>would<s%> not that you should have <S%G2844>fellowship<s%> with <S%G1140>devils.<s%>

You <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G4095>drink<s%> the <S%G4221>cup<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and the <S%G4221>cup<s%> of <S%G1140>devils:<s%> you <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G1410><s%> be <S%G3348>partakers<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord's<s%> <S%G5132>table,<s%> and of the <S%G5132>table<s%> of <S%G1140>devils.<s%>
Do we <S%G3863>provoke<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> to jealousy? are we <S%G2478>stronger<s%> than he?

<S%G3956>All<s%> things are <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for me, but <S%G3956>all<s%> things are not <S%G4851>expedient:<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things are <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for me, but <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G3618>edify<s%> not.
Let <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> his <S%G1438>own,<s%> but <S%G1538>every<s%> man <S%G2087>another's<s%> wealth.
<S%G3956>Whatever<s%> is <S%G4453>sold<s%> in the <S%G3111>shambles,<s%> that <S%G2068>eat,<s%> <S%G350>asking<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> question for <S%G4893>conscience<s%> sake:
For the <S%G1093>earth<s%> is the <S%G2962>Lord's,<s%> and the <S%G4138>fullness<s%> <S%G846>thereof.<s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> of them that <S%G571>believe<s%> not <S%G2564>bid<s%> you to a feast, and you be <S%G2309>disposed<s%> to <S%G4198>go;<s%> <S%G3956>whatever<s%> is <S%G3908>set<s%> <S%G3908>before<s%> you, <S%G2068>eat,<s%> <S%G350>asking<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> question for <S%G4893>conscience<s%> sake.

But <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man <S%G2036>say<s%> to you, <S%G5124>This<s%> is <S%G1494>offered<s%> in <S%G1494>sacrifice<s%> to <S%G1494>idols,<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> not for his sake that <S%G3377>showed<s%> it, and for <S%G4893>conscience<s%> sake: for the <S%G1093>earth<s%> is the <S%G2962>Lord's,<s%> and the <S%G4138>fullness<s%> <S%G846>thereof:<s%>

<S%G4893>Conscience,<s%> I <S%G3004>say,<s%> not <S%G1438>your<s%> <S%G1438>own,<s%> but of the <S%G2087>other:<s%> for <S%G2444>why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> is my <S%G1657>liberty<s%> <S%G2919>judged<s%> of <S%G243>another<s%> man's <S%G4893>conscience?<s%>
For <S%G1487>if<s%> I by <S%G5485>grace<s%> be a <S%G3348>partaker,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> am I <S%G987>evil<s%> <S%G987>spoken<s%> of for that for <S%G3739>which<s%> I give <S%G2168>thanks?<s%>

<S%G1535>Whether<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> you <S%G2068>eat,<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G4095>drink,<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G5100>whatever<s%> you <S%G4160>do,<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> to the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1096>Give<s%> <S%G677>none<s%> <S%G677>offense,<s%> neither to the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G2532>nor<s%> to the <S%G1672>Gentiles,<s%> <S%G2532>nor<s%> to the <S%G1577>church<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%>

<S%G2504>Even<s%> as I <S%G700>please<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> men in <S%G3956>all<s%> things, not <S%G2212>seeking<s%> <S%G1683>my<s%> <S%G1683>own<s%> <S%G4851>profit,<s%> but the <S%G4851>profit<s%> of <S%G4183>many,<s%> that they may be <S%G4982>saved.<s%>
